title: The Key
author: The Key
content: And briefly about plans for the beginning of 2023  Happy New Year, dear readers, friends and partners!During this period everyone revised the results and makes plans for 2023. We are no exception. And today we can’t wait to share this with you.In 2022 the international project The Key has scaled, stabilized, despite the whole storm in the world, and opened up many new directions for the partners.About the key events of 2022:We have completely moved to Web3.0;Constantly kept updating the website for your convenience;Expanded in geography — Russia, the CIS, the UAE, Europe, Turkey and India are with us;Organized BootCamps in Turkey and Spain;Successfully participated in several audits to verify the security of the platform;Launched an investment direction in Dubai The Key Home;Launched the gaming direction Chimera&Meta YuG Games;Have been actively preparing for the listing, which will happen soon!About the global plans for early 2023:The release of the KEYSOURCE token on the exchange and listing — already in January, we are getting ready to the transition to a completely new level;Expanding the community and launching new profitable directions.And we have already started this year on an international scale and opened a direction on the Seychelles! This is the venture of The Key for venture investors.What opportunities does this direction open up?It will strengthen our products and KEYSOURCE tokenIn each separate product and direction of the company, big large investors will be involved on the conditions of the sharesThe products will launch faster and become more scalable.Stay with us and follow the updates at The Key telegram channel t.me/+D0mZ6GSk_RE2ZmRi
